summary: Firefox crashed with gnopernicus magnifier [@ nsXULMenuitemAccessible::GetState]

stack_traces.creator: ginnchen+exoracle@gmail.com
stack_traces.raw_text:
I started Firefox and gnopernicus with magnifier, and then quit firefox.
Firefox crashed, gnopernicus also crashed.

Here's the message.
